Name: Actual trajectory
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: A geometric shape that is defined by a sequence of position points that describe the actual trajectory of the movement of a weather event.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather event

Name: Air temperature
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The temperature of the air, 1.5 meters (4.5 feet) above the ground that is shaded from the other elements. The temperature can be in Fahrenheit degrees or Celsius degrees.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather Observation
Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather forecast

Name: Alert category
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: A short description of the category of the alert message.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather alert

Name: Alert description
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: A narrative description of the weather alert. Generally, the narrative description is approximately 6,000 to 7,000 characters.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather alert

Name: Alert disclaimer
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The alert disclaimer information that is provided by the government source of the alert.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather alert

Name: Alert headline
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The headline text of the weather alert, for example: Tornado Warning in effect until 8AM EDT WED.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather alert

Name: Alert identifier
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The key that uniquely identifies the weather alert.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather alert

Name: Alert instruction
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The text that describes the recommended action by the consumer of the weather alert, for example: A LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY INDICATES THAT ONSHORE WINDS WILL GENERATE FLOODING OF LOW AREAS ALONG THE LAKESHORE.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather alert

Name: Alert issue date time
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The time when the weather alert was issued.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather alert

Name: Alert source
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The source of the weather alert, for example: National Weather Service.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather alert

Name: Alert type
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The type of the weather alert.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather alert

Name: Almanac date
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The date of the almanac record in MMDD format for daily almanac records and in MM format for monthly almanac records.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather almanac

Name: Almanac geographic location
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The geographic location of the almanac record usually defined by latitude and longitude.
Related Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Location
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather almanac

Name: Almanac period
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The number of years for which the almanac records were compiled.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather almanac

Name: Almanac time interval
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The time interval for which the record was created, as a daily summary, a monthly summary, or an annual summary, a summary for the entire data set.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather almanac

Name: Average high temperature
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The average high temperature for the period.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather almanac

Name: Average low temperature
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The average low temperature for the period.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather almanac

Name: Average precipitation
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The average precipitation amount for the period.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather almanac

Name: Average snow accumulation
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The average snow accumulation for the period.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather almanac

Name: Average temperature
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The average temperature for the period.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather almanac

Name: Country Code
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: A code which identifies a country, for example: the country code for Ireland is 'IE'.

Name: Dew point temperature
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The temperature that air must be cooled at constant pressure to reach saturation. The dew point is also an indirect measure of the humidity of the air. The dew point will never exceed the temperature.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather Observation

Name: Discount
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: A deduction made by the seller from the normal sales price of the product.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Sales

Name: Expected occurrence of weather event
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The relationship between the weather event and the weather alert that defines the expected occurrence of weather event.
Related Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather event
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather alert

Name: Feels like temperature
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: An apparent temperature that represents what the air temperature feels like on exposed human skin due to the combined effect of the wind chill or heat index.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather Observation

Name: Forecast date time
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The date and time for which is the forecast made, for example: 20130806T07:00:00
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather forecast

Name: Forecasted trajectory
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: A geometric shape that is defined by a sequence of position points that describe the predicted trajectory of the movement of a weather event.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather event

Name: Forecast geographic location
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The geographic location for which is the forecast made usually defined by latitude and longitude.
Related Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Location
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather forecast

Name: Location
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The place where someone or something has been, is or will be at a given time. The place can be defined with one or more position points (coordinates) or other geometric shapes in a coordinate system, for example: work location, service location.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather Observation

Name: Location Name
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The name of the location.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Location

Name: Location Primary Address
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The relationship between the address and the location that defines the location primary address.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Location

Name: Location Status
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The status of the location, for example: closed, occupied.

Name: Location Type
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The type of location.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Location

Name: Mean sea level pressure
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The mean sea level pressure in the forecast period.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather Observation

Name: Observation date time
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The date and time of the weather observation.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather Observation

Name: Postal Code
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: A code that is included in a postal address to assist the sorting of mail.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather Observation
Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Location

Name: Precipitation amount
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The precipitation amount (liquid or liquid equivalent) in the forecast period. The precipitation represents amount of water that is produced by the condensation of water vapor in the air that reaches the ground.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather Observation

Name: Precipitation type
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: An indicator that shows the expected type accumulation associated with the probability of precipitation in the forecast period, for example: rain, snow.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather forecast

Name: Probability of precipitation
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The maximum probability of precipitation in the forecast period.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather forecast

Name: Product Name
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The primary name assigned to the product that is used in reports and documents referring to the product.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Sales

Name: Product Type
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The merchandising category of the product.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Sales

Name: Record high temperature
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The highest temperature recorded for the period.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather almanac

Name: Record high temperature year
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The year in which the record high temperature was recorded.

Name: Record low temperature
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The lowest temperature recorded for the period.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather almanac

Name: Record low temperature year
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The year in which the record low temperature was recorded.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather almanac

Name: Relative humidity
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The relative humidity of the air, which is defined as the ratio of the amount of water vapor in the air to the amount of vapor required to bring the air to saturation at a constant temperature. Relative humidity is always expressed as a percentage.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather Observation
Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather forecast

Name: Sales
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The details about sales.

Name: Sales Amount
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The monetary value of sales recorded on a given day.

Name: Sales date time
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The date and time on which a sale took place.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Sales

Name: Sales Status
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The status of a sale, for example; closed, cancelled
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Sales

Name: Sales Store
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The retail store in which the sale took place.
Related Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Store
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Sales

Name: Snow accumulation amount
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The expected snow accumulation amount in the forecast period.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather Observation

Name: Store
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The retail store.

Name: Store Identifier
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: A numeric identifier of a retail store.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Store

Name: Store location
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: Identifies geographic location of store.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Store

Name: Store name
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The name of a retail store.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Store

Name: Ultraviolet index
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The category of maximum ultraviolet index. The ultraviolet index represents the strength of the ultraviolet radiation that can cause a human skin sunburn.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather Observation

Name: Visibility
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The horizontal visibility at the observation point. The measurement indicates the distance at which an object can be clearly discerned. Visibilities can be recorded as fractional values particularly when visibility is less than 2 miles.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather Observation

Name: Weather alert
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The warning about the weather event that is expected to occur in a specific geographic region, for example: a flood expected in an area, a storm expected in a region.

Name: Weather alert geographic location
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The relationship between the location and the weather alert that defines the weather alert geographic region.
Related Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Location
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather alert

Name: Weather almanac
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The almanac information for a specific day or month of the year in a specific location. The almanac information is sourced from observations stations from a time period spanning 10 to 30 years or more.

Name: Weather almanac valid for location
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The relationship between the location and the weather almanac that defines the weather almanac valid for location.
Related Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Location
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather almanac

Name: Weather event
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: An actual or forecast unusual weather condition that can result in disruption of service provided to customers.

Name: Weather event description
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: A description of the weather event.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather event

Name: Weather event end date time
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The date and time on which the weather event ended.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather event

Name: Weather event geographic location
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The geographic location of the weather event.
Related Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Location
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather event

Name: Weather event identification number
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The tracking number of the weather event.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather event

Name: Weather event name
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The name of the weather event.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather event

Name: Weather event start date time
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The date and time on which the weather event started.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather event

Name: Weather event type
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The type of weather event, for example: storm, lightning, flood.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather event

Name: Weather forecast
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: A collection of weather condition characteristics forecasted for a particular period.

Name: Weather forecast phrase
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: A phrase that describes the weather for a forecast period, for example: heavy rain, wind.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather forecast

Name: Weather Observation
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The group of measurements that describe the weather condition at a location. The weather observation measurements are recorded at a single point in time.

Name: Wind gust speed
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The information about sudden and temporary variations of the average wind speed. The measurement shows the maximum wind gust speed recorded during the period. The speed of the gust can be expressed in miles per hour or kilometers per hour.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather Observation

Name: Wind speed
Category: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data
Description: The measurement that indicates the velocity of the air flow in the atmosphere. In case of the hourly observations, the wind speed corresponds to a 10-minute average called the sustained wind speed.
Part Of Terms: Industry Accelerators >> Sales Prediction using The Weather Company Data >> Weather Observation
